name: Twitch DOOM
description:
The original DOOM playable through the Twitch Chat. To play go to https://twitch.tv/azazeln28

Commands
  • !f, !forward: Move forward
  • !b, !backward: Move backward
  • !l, !tl, !left, !turnleft: Turn left
  • !r, !tr, !right, !turnright: Turn right
  • !sl, !strafeleft: Strafe left
  • !sr, !straferight: Strafe right
  • !s, !shoot, !fire: Shoot
  • !u, !use: Use
  • !1, !fist: Fist
  • !2, !pistol: Pistol
  • !3, !shotgun: Shotgun
  • !4, !chaingun: Chaingun
  • !5, !rocket: Rocket Launcher
  • !6, !plasma: Plasma Cannon
  • !7, !bfg: BFG9000

You can chain commands using spaces ( ), commas (,), dots (.), semicolons (;) or (:). For example:

!f f f f f - Moves forward 5 times

Or by using amounts:

!f5 - Moves forward 5 times

Or even both:

!f5 sl2 s5 - Move forward 5 times then strafe left two times and the shoot 5 times.

There's a max. amount of 5 commands that can be queued. Every user can send up to 5 of those commands. If you're playing with other people, please, be kind.

If you die, you can use !use, !u, !o or !open to restart.
